meanings.definition: To eat less food than the body needs for proper functioning.
meanings.sent1: She undereats by skipping meals, which can be harmful to her health.
meanings.sent2: He undereats because he forgets to have regular meals during the day.
meanings.sent3: The cat undereats when it leaves some kibbles in its bowl for later.
meanings.sent4: The plant undereats sunlight, causing it to wither and lose its vibrant color.
meanings.sent5: Undereating can lead to feeling weak and tired due to lack of nutrients.

meanings.definition: A person who consistently consumes fewer calories than necessary for maintaining a healthy weight.
meanings.sent1: My friend is an undereats and struggles to gain weight despite eating more.
meanings.sent2: The undereats in our group always orders the smallest portion at restaurants.
meanings.sent3: The undereats at the party only nibbled on a few snacks throughout the night.
meanings.sent4: Being an undereats in a world of food lovers can sometimes feel isolating.
meanings.sent5: The undereats carefully monitors their food intake to avoid gaining extra pounds.
